name: nanurai-mixer-api
description: The API for the nanurai mixer

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=src find ./src -name '*.spec.js' | xargs  mocha -R spec --require ./test/configuration.js
scripts.test-watch: NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=src find ./src -name '*.spec.js' | xargs mocha --watch -R spec --require ./test/configuration.js
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=src find ./src -name '*.spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=html mocha -R spec --require ./test/configuration.js

author: Nanurai Developers
